channel.title: Benoît Piéron on Artangled
channel.description: Recent content in Benoît Piéron on Artangled

item.title: Cottagecore | Sultana
item.description: Cottagecore wasn’t a familiar term for me. I enlarged my vocabulary thanks to a group show named after the aesthetic, on at Sultana in Paris when I visited this week. The word’s unfamiliar but it describes a familiar aesthetic. One of city-dwelling young people, shut out of employment gainful enough to buy a cottage of their own, fetishising a pastoral, artisanal lifestyle. It’s characterised by floral motifs, embroidery, pastel colours and everything “cosy”.
